articles.author: Amy Woodyatt, CNN
articles.title: 2020 was Europe's hottest year on record 'by a considerable amount,' scientists say - CNN
articles.description: The year 2020 was Europe's hottest on record, according to a report published Wednesday by the American Meteorological Society, which also found it to be among the top three hottest years globally.
articles.content:
(CNN)Last year was Europe's hottest on record, according to a report published Wednesday by the American Meteorological Society, which also found 2020 to be among the three hottest years globally.
